mapper.select: select BOARD_ID,TITLE,USER_ID from BOARD order by BOARD_ID desc
mapper.insert: insert into BOARD(BOARD_ID, TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, VIEW_CONT, WRITE_DATE, USER_ID, B_COMMENT_ID, BOARD_IMG_ID) values(BOARD_ID.nextval, #{title}, #{board_content}, NULL, sysdate, NULL, NULL, NULL)
insert into BOARD_IMG(BOARD_IMG_ID, PATH_IMG, FILE_NAME) values('B'||BOARD_IMG_ID.nextval, NULL,#{file_name})
